message: Hello Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. I'm happy to start the negotiations at $2,300,000.  I believe this reflects the true value of what's being offered.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $1,000,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,000,000 is significantly below what I can accept.  To keep things moving, I'll come down to $2,000,000.  I think this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget and the value I see in the product, I would like to propose an offer of $1,500,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
